item.title: Tools that I came across recently
item.description: httrack When I was randomly scrolling in Reddit, i came across a guy asking about how to backup sites and its content in Data hoarder sub reddit. There is came across this free software tool called httrack which take a backup of all the content in the webpage. I Tried scrapping Prasanna’s blog page and the mirror started and scraped the complete file. rclone The another tool which i found is rclone from the same r/data hoarders.
